name: pry bar
description: A sturdy metal pry bar, about two feet long. Heavy enough to force open a stuck hatch.
room_description: A metal pry bar lies on the floor near one of the cryo-pods.

name: security keycard
description: A plastic keycard with a magnetic strip. It reads 'DECK A - ALL ACCESS' with the station's logo.
room_description: A security keycard lies on the floor near the door.

name: flashlight
description: A heavy-duty station flashlight. The beam is bright and steady.
room_description: A flashlight sits on the security desk.

name: alien power cell
description: A hexagonal crystalline cell that pulses with a soft blue light. It radiates warmth. Alien technology far beyond human engineering. It's not quite the right shape for the station's reactor socket.
room_description: A strange hexagonal power cell glows softly on a shelf, pulsing with alien energy.

name: power adapter
description: A prototype adapter designed to interface alien technology with human systems. There are notes scrawled on it: 'Fits hex-cell to standard reactor socket.'
room_description: A custom-built power adapter sits on a workbench, wires trailing from it.

name: adapted power cell
description: The alien power cell fitted snugly into the human-made adapter. It pulses with contained energy, ready to interface with station systems.
room_description: An adapted alien power cell hums with energy.

name: research notes
description:
Dr. Elena Vasquez's research journal. The entries grow increasingly frantic:

'Day 45: The specimen is unlike anything we've seen. Its crystalline structure defies analysis.'
'Day 52: It responds to proximity. Bio-signatures seem to activate it.'
'Day 61: I've locked the chamber with my biometric data. Only my hand scan can open it now. The specimen is too dangerous for general access.'
'Day 63: God help us. It's loose.'
room_description: A spiral-bound research journal lies on the counter, its pages dog-eared.

name: Dr. Vasquez's ID badge
description: A station ID badge for Dr. Elena Vasquez, Chief Xenobiologist. It has a biometric chip embedded in it that might fool a bio-scanner.
room_description: A station ID badge is clipped to the collar of a discarded lab coat.

name: crystalline artifact
description: A fist-sized crystalline structure that shifts between colors — violet, indigo, and deep blue. It vibrates with a frequency you can feel in your bones. It seems to contain enormous energy.
room_description: A crystalline artifact pulses with otherworldly light on the pedestal.

name: data chip
description: A small data storage chip labeled 'EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS - OVERRIDE CODES'. This could be useful for bypassing sealed systems.
room_description: A small data chip lies on the desk among scattered papers.

name: spacesuit
description: A standard EVA spacesuit, bulky but functional. It has a built-in oxygen supply good for several hours. Wearing this would protect against oxygen depletion.
room_description: A spacesuit hangs in one of the lockers, still sealed in its storage bag.

name: riot gas grenade
description: A military-grade riot gas grenade. The canister is stamped 'CS-X COMPOUND — BROAD-SPECTRUM INCAPACITANT'. Designed to subdue hostile organisms through respiratory and neurological disruption. Should work on anything that breathes.
room_description: A riot gas grenade sits in the one locker that's still sealed, visible through the mesh.

name: captain's log
description:
A personal data tablet belonging to Captain Torres. The last entry reads:

'We're evacuating. Five of the seven pods are loaded. Vasquez stayed behind to secure the specimen chamber. I can't reach her on comms. There's one more pod, but we can't wait. The creature has reached Deck A.

To whoever finds this: the override code for the pod bay is 7439. The escape pod in Bay 6 needs external power — the station reserves aren't enough. God speed.

- Capt. R. Torres'
room_description: A data tablet lies on the captain's chair.

name: override terminal
description: A wall-mounted terminal beside the pod bay blast door. The screen is cracked and dark — it needs a data chip to boot its override system.
room_description: A damaged override terminal is mounted beside the blast door.

name: reactor
description: The station's main reactor. A massive cylinder with an empty power cell socket. If you could find a compatible power source, you could restore full station power.

name: biometric scanner
description: A wall-mounted biometric scanner beside the sealed door. It reads palm prints and ID chips to verify authorized personnel.

name: escape pod
description: A single-occupant escape pod in Bay 6. Its status panel reads 'INSUFFICIENT POWER'. The launch system needs an external energy source.

name: weapon locker
description: A heavy-duty weapon locker. It's jammed shut, but you can see a riot gas grenade through the wire mesh. Maybe you could force it open.
room_description: A jammed weapon locker is mounted on the wall.

name: weapon locker
description: A heavy-duty weapon locker, hanging open. The inside is empty.
room_description: A weapon locker hangs open on the wall, its door bent from being pried.
